outcome_description: Board-approved security charter and oversight forum
evidence_required: Approved charter and steering committee minutes
notes: Charter exists but board reporting is irregular

outcome_description: Policy set reviewed and approved annually
notes: Several policies overdue for review

outcome_description: Documented RACI for cyber responsibilities
notes: Responsibilities known informally but not centrally documented

outcome_description: Consistent cyber risk process with treatment tracking
evidence_required: Risk methodology and risk committee records
notes: Risk register exists but scoring is inconsistent

outcome_description: Supplier due diligence and security clauses
evidence_required: Vendor assessment template and contract clauses
notes: No formal third-party review workflow

outcome_description: Complete inventory across endpoint server cloud and SaaS
evidence_required: Asset inventory export and ownership list
notes: Cloud and SaaS inventory not fully reconciled

outcome_description: Assets and data classified by impact and sensitivity
notes: Classification labels not consistently applied

outcome_description: Trust boundaries and key flows documented
evidence_required: Data flow diagrams and network maps
notes: Diagrams exist for primary services only

outcome_description: Routine scanning triage and patch SLAs
notes: Server patching cadence uneven across teams

outcome_description: Threat scenarios integrated into risk reviews
notes: Threat model created ad hoc not periodic

outcome_description: Least privilege JML and access recertification
evidence_required: Access review records and IAM standard
notes: Privileged access recertification incomplete

outcome_description: MFA on admin remote access and critical SaaS
notes: MFA complete for admins but partial for users

outcome_description: Managed baseline and EDR coverage
evidence_required: EDR coverage reports and baseline policy
notes: EDR missing on some warehouse shared devices

outcome_description: Critical patching and secure baselines maintained
evidence_required: Patch compliance reports and hardening baseline
notes: Critical patch SLA breached on legacy VMs

outcome_description: Encryption retention DLP and backup protections
notes: DLP in monitor mode not enforce mode

outcome_description: Annual training and phishing simulations
notes: Program is mature for current org size

outcome_description: Secure SDLC and cloud baseline for portal
evidence_required: Change tickets and cloud posture report
notes: No formal threat modeling in release cycle

outcome_description: Log aggregation and retention across critical systems
evidence_required: SIEM ingest dashboard and retention policy
notes: Firewall and identity logs present server logs partial

outcome_description: Documented and tuned detections for common threats
evidence_required: Use case catalog and tuning records
notes: Alerting heavily dependent on default vendor rules

outcome_description: Coverage for portal identity endpoints and admin actions
notes: Portal app logs not fully normalized in SIEM

outcome_description: Severity model and triage SLAs defined
notes: Workflow documented but out-of-hours handling weak

outcome_description: Behavior baselines for users and systems
notes: No baseline model for service accounts

outcome_description: IR policy plan and escalation matrix
notes: Plan exists but not tested recently

outcome_description: Playbooks for top incident types
notes: Playbooks exist for phishing only

outcome_description: Comms templates and regulatory escalation paths
notes: Legal and customer comms not pre-approved

outcome_description: Log retention and chain-of-custody process
notes: Evidence handling varies by responder

outcome_description: Formal PIR and action tracking
notes: Actions are tracked informally in email

outcome_description: Routine backup monitoring and restore drills
evidence_required: Backup reports and restore test records
notes: Core systems tested quarterly but endpoint restore rare

outcome_description: Cyber scenarios integrated into BC and DR exercises
evidence_required: BCDR exercise records with cyber scenarios
notes: Operations exercises exclude cyber failure modes

outcome_description: Service restoration tiers and stakeholder comms defined
evidence_required: Recovery priority matrix and contact templates
notes: Portal priority documented but warehouse systems omitted

outcome_description: Post-disruption actions owned and tracked to closure
evidence_required: Recovery action tracker and governance review
notes: No formal closure criteria for recovery actions
